content: and worked purl-wise to keep the nice v line down the side of the heel flap matching the toe up side this is achieved as follows with the right side facing and the yarn in front insert the working needle from the back through the heel flap between the edge stitch and the second stitch pull the yarn back through the fabric turn work and make ds knit across the flap stopping 1 stitch before the end set the bor marker here slip the last stitch with yarn in front now pick up and work purl-wise as described above 16 17 18 stitches in the slipped stitch edges place gusset marker 1 gm1 here to indicate the end of the gusset stitches work across instep in ribbing as set the cables are now done place gusset marker 2 gm2 here pick up and work purl-wise 16 17 18 stitches down the other side of the flap place gusset marker 3 gm3 the cable cross at the start of the heel flap removes the need to pick up additional stitches in the corner knit to bor working the ds legs together as one stitch work the gusset decreases the stitches just adjacent to the picked up stitches are the gusset border stitches round 1 k the first stitch as the gusset border stitch size 64 and 72 p1 k1 across 15 - 17 gusset stitches ending with a p1 size 68 p1 k1 across - 16 - gusset stitches ending with a k1 all sizes k2tog the last picked up stitch with the next stitch which will become the instep s gusset border stitch moving gm1 to after this border stitch work across the 30 32 34 instep stitches as presented ssk the stitch before gm2 with the first gusset stitch moving the marker to before this border stitch size 64 and 72 p1 k1 p1 across to gm3 size 68 k1 p1 across to gm3 knit to bor round 2 work the stitches as they appear no decreases round 3 work up the gusset as presented until 2 stitches before gm1 k2tog work the instep as presented until gm2 ssk the border stitch with the first gusset stitch work remainder of the gusset as presented to gm3 knit to bor continue working rounds 2 and 3 until 2 stitches remain between bor and gm1 end having just worked a decrease row not a plain row remove bor marker cross the next two stitches as a 1x1 cable with the sole stitch crossing in front of the instep stitch set the bor between the two stitches and remove gm1 work the instep to gm2 work a 1x1 cable using the stitches between gm2 and gm3 again with the sole crossing in front of the instep place a mor marker between the two stitches replacing both gm2 and gm3 knit to bor foot now work the same number of rounds as for the toe up sock keeping the stitches in stockinette on
